success_message: Your message has been successfully sent.
about_description: I am Elvis, a FULL-STACK WEB DEVELOPER
transforming: Turning ideas into reality, one line of code at a time. Let's collaborate and grow together!
about_me_description: A passionate junior developer with a year of experience in web development. I specialize in building web applications using technologies such as Node.js, MongoDB, Express, and Tailwind. I'm a quick learner and a team player, always looking to improve my skills and learn new technologies to deliver innovative and efficient solutions. My goal is to continue growing as a developer and contribute to projects that make a difference in people's lives.
project_1_description: I developed a complete web application for a laundry, utilizing cutting-edge technologies and tools such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MongoDB, Tailwind, Express, Mongoose, and Route. This application allows customers to book washing machines and dryers, view their reservations, as well as their payment history.
contact_description: Are you looking for a full-stack web developer who is dedicated and skilled to bring your project to life? Let's connect and explore how we can create something amazing together!
thank_you: Thank you for visiting my portfolio!
